title: Anonymous payments
description: All NymVPN payment information is unlinkable to your use of the app thanks to zero-knowledge proofs.

title: Crypto-friendly
description: Pay with complete anonymity with crypto like Monero and Zcash. Help support a Web3 network of independent operators with the NYM token.

title: Can't log design
description: Other VPNs promise not to log your data, but they still can. NymVPN is designed differently: we can't log your traffic so your data stays secure.

title: Metadata protection
description: NymVPN not only encrypts your data but also protects your metadata so you have the comprehensive online security you need.

title: No sneaky software
description: Other VPNs keep their code private, allowing them to sneak in adware, tracking software, and even malware. All Nym code is open source.
